iti100:2.1: “Ahamasmi, bhikkhave, brahmano yacayogo sada payatapani antimadehadharo anuttaro bhisakko sallakatto.
iti100:2.2: Tassa me tumhe putta orasa mukhato jata dhammaja dhammanimmita dhammadayada, no amisadayada.
iti100:3.3: Etadaggam, bhikkhave, imesam dvinnam dananam yadidam dhammadanam.
iti100:4.3: Etadaggam, bhikkhave, imesam dvinnam samvibhaganam yadidam dhammasamvibhago.
iti100:5.3: Etadaggam, bhikkhave, imesam dvinnam anuggahanam yadidam dhammanuggaho.
iti100:6.3: Etadaggam, bhikkhave, imesam dvinnam yaganam yadidam dhammayago”ti.
iti100:8.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
